title: Real World Uses of Bitwise Operators
metaDescription: As a developer, you definitely would’ve learned about bitwise operators at some point and would’ve thought to yourself. “huh, that’s neat. but where would I actually use it?”.

title: All You Need To Know About Comments in Ruby
metaDescription: It is well known that the ruby comments are used to leave notes or micro-docs within the code and is ignored by the Ruby Interpreter. But can we do other things with comments?

title: Introduction To RAM Disks in Linux
metaDescription: Learn to create temporary high speed virtual disks out of your free RAM on most Linux Distros using the RAM disks feature.

title: RISC V Instruction Set Architecture Explained
metaDescription: RISC V ISA is rapidly gaining popularity in the computer engineering world. Learn about how it is going the be next big thing and why you should support it.
